rows.mepc_reference: MEPC.379(80) Page 44, Particulars of the 'Sample Ship'
rows.ihm_output: Page 1 contains Name, IMO No., Preparer/Owner. Missing: Port of registry, Type of vessel, Gross tonnage, Name of shipbuilder, Date of delivery.
rows.remarks: The essential particulars required for the identification block of the IHM (such as GT, Port of registry, Builder, and Date of delivery) are missing from the front page summary.

rows.mepc_reference: MEPC.379(80) Page 44, Attachment 3: Location diagram of hazardous materials
rows.ihm_output: The Table of Contents lists 'Step-2 Assessment of collected information' (P29) and 'Location of samples collected on-board' (P30) and 'Step-3 Final Visual Sampling and Check Plan (VSCP)' (P45), but not the explicitly required Attachment 3 Location Diagram.
rows.remarks: While sampling location data is listed, the mandatory 'Attachment 3: Location diagram of hazardous materials' is not explicitly listed or referenced under its required title/function in the primary attachments list (Page 44 mandate).

rows.mepc_reference: MEPC.379(80) Page 17 & 19, Standard Format (Part I, II, III)
rows.ihm_output: Page 2/3 lists: Part-II (P9), Part-III (P10), and Step-5 Preparation of Part 1 (P96).
rows.remarks: The report structure confirms the inclusion and location of all three mandatory parts (I, II, and III) of the Inventory.

rows.mepc_reference: MEPC.379(80) Page 12, Appendix 4: Flow diagram for developing Part I for existing ships
rows.ihm_output: Page 2 lists Appendix – 4 as 'IHM Expert Company Certificate' (P172).
rows.remarks: The report appendix numbering is non-standard and replaces the required reference to the Appendix 4 Flow Diagram (relevant for existing ships methodology, see MEPC Page 29/Appendix 4 title) with a certificate document.

rows.mepc_reference: MEPC.379(80) Page 12, Appendix 1: Items to be listed in the Inventory of Hazardous Materials (Table A & B)
rows.ihm_output: Page 2 lists Appendix – 1, containing Table A, Table B, Table C, and Table D (P101-105).
rows.remarks: All necessary material lists (Table A and B) are explicitly included within the documentation, along with supplemental lists (C and D).

rows.ihm_output: Page 2 lists Appendix – 9 Material Declaration (MD) (P197) and Appendix – 10 Supplier's Declaration of Conformity (SDoC) (P198).
rows.remarks: While the appendix numbering is shifted, the mandatory Material Declarations (MD) and Supplier's Declarations of Conformity (SDoC) are confirmed as included in the report.
